# NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.contentList

**Case**

The content list behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
case contentList
```

## Discussion

This behavior corresponds to split view items that you create using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewItem/init(contentListWithViewController:)].

## Item Behaviors

- **NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.default**: The default split view item behavior.
- **NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.sidebar**: The sidebar behavior.
- **NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.inspector**: The inspector behavior.

items.description: The default split view item behavior.
items.name: NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.default
